numlitem.para: Other procedures do not require use of APU,
APU is used for ground operations only,
APU is continuously monitored by ground personnel when operating,
APU external control system is operative, and
APU is not used during taxi.

note.para: Ensure BAT switch is ON for aircraft operation after Maintenance Procedures are complied with.

numlitem.para: For APU use during ground operations, position a fire guard near the tail of the aircraft to monitor the APU.
Do not use the APU inflight or during taxi operations.

placard.para: Placard the ENG/APU/FIRE/OVHT TEST switch "APU FIRE DET INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: When maintenance personnel are not available, the check may be conducted by the flight crew in coordination with AMC. During operation the APU must be continuously monitored by a fire guard near the tail of the aircraft. The APU must be shutdown prior to taxi.

numlitem.para: Position fire guard near tail of aircraft to monitor APU.
At APU shutdown panel on nose landing gear (P62), press APU FIRE SHUTDOWN switch and check that APU shuts down.
